FuncDef: The display power-supply information command displays power distribution information on a device.
Examples: Item   Limit   Assigned  Assigned/Limit  Left      Real     Real/Limit
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In routine maintenance, to view power distribution information on a device, run the display power-supply information command. The command output includes the power distribution mode, power consumption, working temperature, and power usage on a chassis, as well as power usage in each area if partitioned power supply is used.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
